function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Continued spread of COVID-19 in some countries leading to further waves of infections and lockdowns","Impact":"Increased transmission and healthcare system overload","Mitigation":"Strict public health measures, vaccination campaigns, and international cooperation","Technologies":"Vaccines, contact tracing apps, and remote healthcare monitoring","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government agencies, public health authorities, and international organizations"},{"Description":"Potential for future pandemics to emerge","Impact":"Global health crisis and economic instability","Mitigation":"Early detection systems, international cooperation, and research funding for virology","Technologies":"Virus surveillance systems, genetic sequencing technologies, and rapid testing kits","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, and governments","Owner":"International health organizations, research institutions, and governments"}]}
